description: Sanai Hashimoto (橋本 左内, Hashimoto Sanai, April 19, 1834 - November 1, 1859) was a Japanese samurai and loyal supporter of the Emperor during the final days of the Tokugawa regime. Hashimoto was executed by decapitation at Edo`s Kozukappara execution grounds on November 1, 1859 (episode 16). Like Ibuya Manjirou, he`s a member of the Fuchuu clan. [Source: Wikipedia (edited)]
name: Hashimoto Sanai
